forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 65. Southwest wind 6 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, revealing a day that promises an embrace of sunshine and airy warmth. The forecast suggests a gentle lift in temperatures, reaching a comfortable 65 degrees, complemented by a southwest breeze that whispers through the city streets. As the light filters through, one notices the lingering tendrils of fog retreating towards the edges of the bay, allowing glimpses of the Golden Gate in its splendid isolation. There’s a clarity to the surroundings today, painting a picturesque canvas of soft blues against the warm hues of the rising sun.

As the day unfolds, the air stays crisp and inviting, making it an ideal time for leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or beneath the canopies of the city’s iconic parks. The hint of the marine layer still in the corners of the city serves as a reminder that even the sunniest of days can hold secrets of the ocean’s depths. For those venturing outdoors, layers are a prudent choice; a light jacket will serve well against the cool breezes that dance through the neighborhoods. Whether one finds solace in café windows, watching the world unfold, or ventures out to explore, the day speaks of potential and discovery, a perfect San Francisco summer morning.
